title: Decorative Sculpture on the Facade of Santa Maria Novella, Decorative Carving on the Doorway, Central Motif of the Lintel, Florence
description: studded ring with three feathers through center, entwined with crimped ribbons; fruits and foliage at L and R; mounted on two sheets of stiff paper, cream over grey
creditline: Gift of Rosemary and Elliot Offner in honor of Emily Offner Hollidge
